title: Educational Technology Integration Strategies for 21st-Century Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen competencies in designing social studies lessons using digital devices, fostering educational design skills that consider technical and ethical issues in online environments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to implement at least three lesson designs linked to social studies curriculum standards using digital tools.
Learners will be able to apply at least two technology-based interaction strategies to enhance student engagement in online learning environments.
Learners will be able to identify and propose solutions for personal information protection and accessibility issues that may arise when introducing educational technology.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
